column5: My buddy and I caught 6 pike today on the St.Larry. All fish were caught in 22ft. of water.Great day to on the water.
Wow...nice pike!!!  Great seeing soft water reports again....
Awesome. I love the pike porn. In 22ft of water,what are you catching em with? This month we have had moderate success with the gators in 5-8 ft on jerk baits. Very clean lookin fish.
Good sized Pike, looks like some nice calm water...
Good stuff, Larry. We still have ice here on the skinny water so I won't be out before pike closes. Thanks for posting...you certainly have them dialed in.
Great looking Pike Larry!!....I had to be content pulling out a few lil ones through the ice over the weekend....
Beauty  ... Congrats.   Just a few short months and I hope to get into some action like that.  Been a looooong winter (as usual).
What did you use to get 'em that deep?  Were you trolling or drifting?  If you don't mind me asking.
That's a chunky pike. Good job
Great report and pic Lungelarry  That is one great looking gator!!  Congratulations Thanks for sharing Leechman
Nice pike, i dont know whether or not i'm happy to see open water reports or not....lol....still quite a bit of ice up here......then the horrible 1 -2 week wait for rthe transition...
